Package com.sgp.sem3.crudapisbjavamvn.controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
com.sgp.sem3.crudapisbjavamvn.controller.StudentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/student") public class StudentController extends Object
For Controlling and Mapping Requests to Service. Uses StudentService to map methods.
Version:
v2 Changed DeleteMapping return type to Response Entity
Author:
PARTH
See Also:
StudentService

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addStudent​(@RequestBody Student student)
      Controls to map adding new record to Database
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to be recorded.  Fetched from body of Http request by Spring MVN.
      Returns:
      One of the following Status Codes:
      • 201 for successful addition of record
      • 500 Server Error

    • updateStudent

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateStudent​(@RequestBody Student student)
      Controls to map Modifying exising record in Database
      Parameters:
      student - Student object to be recorded.  Fetched from body of Http request by Spring MVN.
      Returns:
      One of the following Status Codes:
      • 201 for successful push of record
      • 500 Server Error

    • getAllStudents

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Student>> getAllStudents()
      Maps Fetch All Records Service to HTTP request and performs Service
      Returns:
      One of the following Status Codes:
      • 200 for successful fetch of all records
      • 500 Server Error

    • getStudentById

      @GetMapping("/{sid}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Student> getStudentById​(@PathVariable String sid)
      Maps Service to HTTP request and Fetches a single record.
      Parameters:
      sid - ID of the student to be fetched from the Database.
      Returns:
      One of the following Status Codes:
      • 200 for successful fetch of record
      • 500 Server Error

    • deleteStudent

      @DeleteMapping("/{sid}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteStudent​(@PathVariable String sid)
      Maps Service to HTTP request and Deletes a single record.
      Parameters:
      sid - ID of the student to be fetched from the Database.
      Returns:
      One of the following Status Codes:
      • 204 for successful delete of record
      • 500 Server Error
